article_title: 3 women caught on camera stealing from REI
article_text:
Police are hoping someone can identify three women who were caught on camera stealing thousands of dollars’ worth of clothing from a sporting goods store.

Click to see surveillance images

Greenville police said that the woman shoplifted the clothing from REI on Woodruff Road last Wednesday.

The images showed two women dressed in scrubs and a third in an LA Dodgers jersey stealing $4,660 worth of clothing.

Two of the women were carrying distinctive purses, one with an American flag design and the other was a British flag design.

Anyone with information is asked to call Greenville Crime Stoppers at 864-23-CRIME.
